: : DeathStar : :

DeathStar: No full combat. We would be outnumberd and they have an 
experianced commander in Rodimus Prime. I'll allow some artillary 
strikes on their base, however.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Clawstorm: How about we drop on the Maxies, kill a few of 'em and 
> bring the heads as gift for the Major? I personally like the idea...
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
wrote:
> > : : DeathStar : :
> > 
> > DeathStar takes in the sight, also.
> > 
> > DeathStar: I love Cybertron, but I have to admit that these 
organic 
> planets are stunning.
> > 
> > He begins to scan the Earth's surface.
> > 
> > DeathStar: Now it will just be a few nano clicks before I find 
the 
> Tripredacus base.
> > 
> > 
> > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > The small ship stops next to the other Tripred.
> > 
> > Clawstorm: Hehe... Slag you, Deathstar! You're lucky I had such a 
> > small engine! But I....
> > 
> > He stops as he sees the show right before him. Earth in all its 
> > majesty, and the Moon right around her.
> > 
> > Clawstorm: Whoa... What a sight!
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> wrote:
> > > : : DeathStar : :
> > > 
> > > Back in time, over Earth, the rift ripples through space. 
> DeathStar 
> > comes through it at high speed.
> > > 
> > > DeathStar: Haha, I still have it... Oh pit!
> > > 
> > > DeathStar is moveing to fast and is about to get trapped by 
> Earth's 
> > gravity and enter the atmosphere on a lethal course. It takes 
every 
> > bit of power he has to pull up. Once he has, he cuts his engines 
> and 
> > waits for Clawstorm.
> > > 
> > > 
> > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > Clawstorm: Here I go, pops!
> > > 
> > > He pushed on the thruster pedal and launched his ship in 
pursuit 
> of 
> > > Deathstar. However, after just a few nanoclicks, it became 
> evident 
> > > that the ship wasn't as fast as the bot. As he entered through 
> the 
> > > rift, he tried to take a boost.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@y...> 
> > wrote:
> > > > : : DeathStar : :
> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar chuckles.
> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar: If you think you can keep up with this "old bot." 
> > First 
> > > one to Earth's atmosphere wins.
> > > > 
> > > > DeathStar punches his thrusters taking him into the transwarp 
> > rift.
> > > > 
> > > > 
> > > > Nic <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > > > Clawstorm: Arright! That'll be some funtime! 
*Howllllllllllllll*

> > > > He thrust his ship faster and farther, coming up just next to 
> > > > Deathstar.
> > > > 
> > > > Clawstorm: Wanna race?
> > > >

Tyrael's

> > > > > In a little one-manned ship, another Tripredacus followed.

fair! 
> I 
> > > > wanna 
> > > > > crush 'em too!

> > > > something 
> > > > > strange to him. Since he wasn't a flyer, he had to take a 
> ship, 
> > > but 
> > > > > he didn't care. The promise of action was far too appealing.
> > > > > 
> > > > > He was Clawstorm, the werewolf.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Clawstorm: Hey, we going to meet the major, right? That is 
> > where 
> > > he 
> > > > > is, on Earth?

command 
> > when

> > > > > > optics move to Dreadplague. Was there something there? He 
> was

> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Tripredacus Command, Cybertron: We have recieved your 
> request 
> > > > agent 
> > > > > > Drakangel. We are currently scrambling support troops. 
Your 
> > > > > personal 
> > > > > > request has already been met. Air Commander DeathStar is 
> > > leaving 
> > > > as 
> > > > > > we speak. Tripredacus Command, over and out.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > On the surface of Cybertron a rather large group of 
> > Tripredacus 
> > > > > > flyers is assembled. Addressing the group is a large 
black 
> > bot, 
> > > > who 
> > > > > > looks to have an alt mode of a star fighter.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > DeathStar: ... With that, I will be leaving you. General 
> > Arnot 
> > > > will 
> > > > > > take over. I will be going to Earth to deal with our 
> friends 
> > > > > problems 
> > > > > > in these... Beast Wars. I bid you farewell my troops. 
> Vehical 
> > > > mode!
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > DeathStar transformes to his star fighter mode and blasts 
> off 
> > > > > towards 
> > > > > > the transwarp rift, leaving Cybertron behind.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Back on Cybertron, General Arnot has started to speak, 
when 
> > > > > suddenly, 
> > > > > > an explosion shakes the area, terminating him. The flyers 
> > > > scramble.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Random Tripred Flyer #1: What in the name of Primus is 
> going 
> > on?
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Random Tripred Flyer #2: It's an attack! Must be the n....
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Before the transformer can finish his sentence he is 
> crushed 
> > as 
> > > a 
> > > > > > black and silver Earth semi-truck drives over him. Soon 
> > after, 
> > > a 
> > > > > > black and yellow Earth jet fires it's weapons, clearing 
the 
> > > area, 
> > > > > > before landing next to the truck. The attacking vehicals 
> > > > transform 
> > > > > to 
> > > > > > their robot modes.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > Diesel: So much for the recon mission, eh, Razor?
> > > > > >

> > > his

> > > > rest 
> > > > > of 
> > > > > > the nWo...
